name: Biscuit & Egg Sandwich
detail: Two eggs soft scrambled served on a housemade biscuit served with tomato salad.

name: Bread & Butter
detail: Toasted housemade bread served with butter and housemade jam.

name: Breakfast Sandwich
detail: Eggs your style, Vermont cheddar, and applewood smoked bacon on housemade sourdough.

name: Croissant Breakfast Sandwich
detail: Egg your style, Vermont cheddar, sliced tomato, avocado, and baby arugula on housemade croissant.

name: Croque Madame
detail: Housemade croissant, ham, Gruyere, egg your style, and Mornay sauce.

name: Croque Monsieur
detail: Housemade croissant, ham, Gruyere and Mornay sauce.

name: Crunchy Halloumi Salad
detail: Bibb & red leaf lettuce, seared halloumi cheese, roasted carrots with sesame, raisins, radish, apples, and crunchy almonds in a tahini vinaigrette.

name: Fattoush Salad
detail: Bibb and red leaf lettuce, tomato, cucumber, red pepper, onion, kalamata olives, sunflower seeds, and feta in a lemon-olive oil dressing with za'atar croutons.

name: Green & Nutty Salad
detail: Bibb & red leaf lettuce, baby arugula, apples, black sesame, edamame, dried apricot, and toasted sunflower and pumpkin seeds topped with goat cheese in an orange vinaigrette.

name: Halloumi & Sunny-Side Breakfast Sandwich
detail: Seared halloumi cheese, griddled tomatoes, and sautéed spinach with a sunny-side up egg on our house-made challah roll.

name: Lamb Hash
detail: Our own version of Hash! Lamb cooked with warm spices sautéed with potatoes, sweet potatoes, carrots, pickled red cabbage, and then topped with a poached egg and green dressing. Served with roasted garlic labneh, tomato salad and our housemade challah.

name: Lamb Meatball & Labneh Shakshuka
detail: Tomato and bell pepper sauce, eggs, lamb meatballs, and peppadew peppers topped with spicy labneh and parsley. Served with housemade challah bread.

name: Maple, Squash & Chicken Salad
detail: Mixed greens, baby kale, roasted acorn squash, carrots, and roasted chicken breast topped with toasted almonds and dried cranberries served with maple labneh dressing.

name: Muesli
detail: Whipped Greek yogurt topped with housemade granola, raspberries, blueberries, blackberries, pear, apple, honey, and black sesame.

name: Potato, Mushroom, & Bacon Shakshuka
detail: Potato sauce, baby spinach, shiitake, and button mushrooms, poached egg topped with bacon, parsley relish, garlic Aleppo oil, grated parmesan, and fresh parsley served with housemade sourdough.

name: Prosciutto & Parmesan Scrambled Egg Plate
detail: Two eggs soft scrambled served with prosciutto, Parmesan and toasted housemade sourdough.

name: Roasted Pear, Granola & Labneh
detail: Roasted pears served with housemade granola, labneh, and VT maple syrup.

name: Smoked Salmon, Avocado, & Egg Sandwich
detail: Smoked salmon, avocado, red onion, capers, alfalfa sprouts, and creamy scrambled eggs served on a housemade challah roll with green herbed dressing.

name: Spinach, Sunchoke & Egg Plate
detail: Sauteed spinach, roasted sunchokes, and poached egg served over garlic labneh and topped with Aleppo chili oil. Served with housemade sourdough.

name: Tomato & Goat Cheese Scrambled Egg Plate
detail: Two eggs soft scrambled served with ricotta goat cheese mousse and sun-dried cherry tomatoes marinated in garlic and olive oil served with toasted housemade sourdough. You can add on sautéed spinach.

name: Traditional Shakshuka
detail: Traditional North African dish of eggs poached in a tomato sauce with chili, bell peppers, and onions spiced with cumin and topped with feta and parsley. Served with housemade challah bread.
